name: 'Tis But A Scratch
description:
A game inspired by the theme of the 2022 Game Off game jam, where you shoot 3 types of enemies in an endless, top-down shooter style, survival game where you use Cli-ché cards to upgrade your gear!

Made using the awesome Godot game engine!

The sourcecode is hosted on github for anyone to explore here: https://github.com/BlazingEdgeGames/-Tis-But-A-Scratch-game-

Thank you to Itch.io and Github for hosting this amazing game jam, can't wait to see the games made by other members of this community!

*Game title subject to change.
